Description.Text: Stop at Go Native Apartments Mayfair to discover the wonders of London. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room, laundry service. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, heating, desk, iPod docking station. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all London has to offer by making Go Native Apartments Mayfair your base.
